trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> objects that are selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 中選取的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of rows in the collection is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were selected.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的資料列的順序不會保證以符合之前選取的順序。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: To clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" /> 中尋找的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified row is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的資料列是否包含在集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="dataGridViewRow" /> is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 在集合中，則為 <paramref name="dataGridViewRow" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合複製項目之目的端一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零為起始的索引，而且複製會從該位置開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的元素複製至以指定的索引為起始點的指定陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> 中的項目數大於從 <paramref name="index" /> 到 <paramref name="array" /> 結尾之間的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> 無法自動轉換成 <paramref name="array" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>dataGridViewRow</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應插入 <c>dataGridViewRow</c> 之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a row into the collection at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 將資料列插入指定位置的集合中。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: To insert a row into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要插入資料列插入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> 中之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得在指定索引處的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> at the current index.
trans-unit.target: 在目前索引上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the number of rows in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 等於或大於集合中的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection" /> 執行個體中的元素清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> containing the elements of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 包含集合之項目的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="null" /> unless overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 除非在衍生類別中覆寫，否則這個屬性會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合複製項目之目的端一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中以零為起始的索引，而且複製會從該位置開始。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的元素複製至以指定的索引為起始點的指定陣列。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> 中的項目數大於從 <paramref name="index" /> 到 <paramref name="array" /> 結尾之間的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> 無法自動轉換成 <paramref name="array" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否同步化存取集合 (執行緒安全)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，這個物件可以用來對集合進行同步存取。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用以同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.target: 傳回列舉值，可用來逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，可用於逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: The item to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.target: 永遠擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.target: 插入 <paramref name="value" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Always throws <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠擲回 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: To remove a row from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 一律擲回。
